title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Preventing Academic Dishonesty and Educational Design in Online Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can classify three or more types of academic dishonesty occurring in online science experiment simulations.
Learners can analyze survey data to interpret the correlation between instructional design elements and academic dishonesty.
Learners can propose two or more instructional design strategies to prevent academic dishonesty in VR-based science projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
